content: I'm working on a short panel presentation and I'd like a few slides on SMART on FHIR. I could develop them myself, but I'm betting there might already be some slides out there licensed under Creative Commons. Can anyone point me to some (preferably recent-ish)?
We keep links to our evergreen decks at bit.ly/smart-fhir-tech (you're welcome to reuse these under CC-BY and I can add an explicit copyright slide if/where helpful.

Thanks, @Josh Mandel! Google docs is blocked on my work network, but I'll check it out once I get off the VPN! As for licensing, I think an explicit slide would be helpful for people who stumble on the slides and aren't sure of the licensing restrictions (and helpful for proving to legal/communications departments that the slides can be legally re-used).
Great. I added a license statement + link at the entry page above. Can add slides too.
Awesome. I actually was excited to see the slides, so I popped off VPN just now and saw you typing in the license statement in real time. This is where the magic happens. Thanks, Josh!
